reuters.title: NASDAQ MARCH SHORT INTEREST WAS 184.9 MLN SHRS VS 215.7 MLN SHARES IN FEBRUARY
reuters.body: Federal Reserve Board Chairman Paul Volcker said that the dollar's slide in currency markets has been enough, a Fed spokesman said. The spokesman confirmed that Volcker, who spoke to a group of financial analysts, said in answer to a question about the dollar's recent slide that "enough is enough." Volcker has often expressed concern about the dollar falling too rapidly in currency markets. Reuter 
